nodes.bodyText: can use constant here and on line 1330 to make it really obvious what's going on

I think this should be part of a new migrations.1.11.0.xml, unless we're targeting for a hotfix. Adding a new migrations file is a bit of a pain; you also have to at least update compose_setup, propose_migrations.sh, and the integration tests. Just pointing it out, will defer to @denis-yuen  and @garyluu

nodes.bodyText: Saw your comments on Slack... Just curious what changed? It's a random digit after avatars, or a different one? Or the subdomain isn't there at all?
